text: Samantha Tamania Anne Cecilia Mumba (born 18 January 1983) is an Irish singer, dancer, actress and musician who first became famous around 2000 with the single "Gotta Tell You". Samantha sings contralto.Rock N Roll Gold Rush: A Singles Un-Cyclopedia By Maury Dean Mumba has also been in many movies, in particular independent movies. Mumba's first single, "Gotta Tell You", reached No. 1 in the Irish charts. It later reached No. 2 in the British charts. Mumba also had success in the USA, with the song reaching No. 4 on the Billboard Hot 100. To date, her first album has sold over 4 million copies worldwide. ==Filmography== ===Films=== * The Time Machine (2002) * Spin The Bottle (2003) * Boy Eats Girl (2005) * Nailed (2006) * Johnny Was (2006) * 3 Crosses (2007) * Shifter (2007) * Loftus Hall (2011) ===Television=== *Get Your Act Together with Harvey Goldsmith (2008) *Dancing On Ice (2008) ==Awards and nominations== *Grammy Award **2001, Best Remixed Recording, Non-Classical (Nominated) *Meteor Music Awards **2002, Best Female Singer (Won) *MOBO Awards **2001, Best Album, Gotta Tell You (Nominated) **2000, Best Video, "Gotta Tell You" (Nominated) *Smash Hits ** Poll Winners' Party Best New Female (Won) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Dublin Category:Dancing on Ice participants Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish pop singers Category:R&B; singers Category:Singers from Dublin
title: Samantha Mumba
